data.question:
Situation:
Nadin meets a stranger in park.

Nadin : ''Hello, ... is Nadin.”
Amir : "Hi, I am Amir.
Nadin : "Nice to meet you, Amir"
Amir : "Nice to meet you too"

The right answer to fill the blank is .....
Choose the corect sentence that describes the woman above.

answers.jawaban: She is wearing a long skirt.
She is wearing a red jacket.

data.question: Identify the sentence in the simple present tense:

answers.jawaban: We went to the park last weekend.
He is going to the market.
I have been studying for hours.
She visits her grandmother every Sunday.

data.question:
Kebun Raya Bogor: The Lush Botanical Garden of Indonesia
Kebun Raya Bogor, also known as the Bogor Botanical Gardens, is one of Indonesia's most iconic natural landmarks. Located in the heart of Bogor, West Java, this sprawling 87-hectare garden was established in 1817 during the Dutch colonial period. It serves as a sanctuary for over 15,000 species of plants, including rare orchids, towering palm trees, and the giant rafflesia flower. The garden also features a historic presidential palace, serene ponds, and an extensive library dedicated to botanical research.
Kebun Raya Bogor is not just a tourist destination but also a center for plant conservation, research, and education. Visitors can explore its tranquil paths, marvel at unique flora, or simply enjoy the cool climate that Bogor is famously known for. It remains a testament to Indonesia's commitment to preserving its rich biodiversity.

What additional feature does Kebun Raya Bogor have besides plants?

Supriyadi, A Renowned Welder from East Java, Indonesia

Supriyadi is celebrated as one of the finest welders in East Java, Indonesia. Known for his exceptional skills and precision, he has mastered various welding techniques, including TIG, MIG, and stick welding. With over 15 years of experience, Supriyadi has worked on numerous complex projects ranging from heavy machinery repairs to artistic metalwork. His dedication to quality and safety has earned him recognition in the local and national welding community. Moreover, Supriyadi often mentors aspiring welders, sharing his expertise and passion for the craft, inspiring the next generation of skilled workers in Indonesia.

How long has Supriyadi been working as a welder?

Situation :
Ms. Aini calls Michael for introducing himself in font of the class. He is a new student in The Vocational High School Four Bogor.

Ms. Aini : Michael, come here for introducing yourself in front of the class.
Michel : Yes mam. Hello everyone, my name is Michael. But ..... Mike. It's nice to meet you

What it the suitable choices to complete the dialogue above?
Which sentence shows a habitual action?

answers.jawaban: We were watching TV all night.
I will go to the party tonight.
She was dancing when I arrived.

data.question: Which sentence uses a possessive pronoun correctly?

Software Engineering Laboratory at SMKN 4 Bogor



The Software Engineering Laboratory at SMKN 4 Bogor is a modern facility designed to nurture students' skills in software development and programming. Equipped with advanced tools and technologies, the lab provides an ideal environment for hands-on learning and innovation. Students have access to high-performance computers, software development kits, and industry-standard platforms to practice coding, application development, and problem-solving.

The lab also emphasizes collaborative learning, with team projects and programming challenges that mimic real-world scenarios. Teachers and mentors guide students through various programming languages, software design principles, and project management techniques. The lab's curriculum aligns with industry demands, ensuring students graduate with competitive skills for further education or employment.

What types of tools are available in the laboratory?

answers.jawaban: High-performance computers and software development kits.

data.question:
Jasmine is a native flower to some tropical areas in South Asia, Africa and Australia. In India, some varieties of Jasmine are used for religious purposes. The flower can grow up to 3 meters high and 2 meters wide. It releases its fragrance mostly after the sun sets especially nearing the full moon. Therefore, it is often associated with soothing night- time moods. The planting of Jasmine is started by putting some cuttings in 3 inch posts within 4 weeks. After the roots grow, they are put into 6 inch pots. The soil in the pots should be kept moist but possible for the water to go through it for optimum growth.

There are some important advantages of Jasmine. In medication, this flower is often used for soothing headaches, stimulating brain, and restoring balance. Its extract is also widely used in the making of perfume.

In planting Jasmine, the soil should be kept moist to make it ….

answers.jawaban: grow up to 6 inch in length
grow up to 5 inch in length

data.question:
Gold is a precious metal. Gold is used as ornaments or as money. Gold is found in many places, but in a small supply. It is often found on the surface of the earth. Since gold is a heavy substance, it is sometimes found loose on bottom of rivers. The gold is found together with sand and rocks, and must be separated from them. It is simple to search for this type of gold. It is not usually necessary to drill for gold, but when a layer of gold is located deep below the surface of the earth, it is possible to drill a hole into the ground. Engineers have developed modern process for removing gold from rocks. Since gold is not very hard, it is sometimes melted and added to other substances for making rings, coins, and art objects. It will be priced forever because it is beautiful, rare, and useful.

data.question:
Ardhi Sulistyo is celebrated as one of Indonesia's top mechanics, achieving an impressive second place in the 2018 World Technician Grand Prix (WTGP) Yamaha. This prestigious global competition brought together the most skilled mechanics from various countries to showcase their expertise in motorcycle maintenance and repair. Ardhi's success highlights his exceptional technical knowledge, precision, and dedication to his craft. His achievement has made him a source of pride for Indonesia, inspiring aspiring mechanics nationwide.

How did Ardhi Sulistyo's accomplishment impact Indonesia?

answers.jawaban: It led to the establishment of a national racing team
It inspired future mechanics and brought pride to the country
It improved Indonesia's standing in international politics
It influenced the creation of new motorcycle brands

data.question:
Yuma Soerianto: A Young Programmer with Indonesian Roots



Yuma Soerianto is a young programmer of Indonesian descent who currently lives in Melbourne with his family. He developed a talent for computer programming after being introduced to the field by his father, Hendri Soerianto, at the age of six. He even took online courses at Stanford University. Over the years, Yuma has achieved numerous accomplishments. Through his achievements, Yuma has indirectly brought pride to Indonesia in the field of programming. Here are some of Yuma's notable accomplishments:
- Received the World Youth Forum (WYF) award in Egypt.
- Won the Victorian Young Achiever Award.
- Recognized as one of the 74 Icons of Pancasila Achievement.
- Awarded an Apple WWDC Scholarship five times (2017-2021).
- Became the Youngest Programmer at the Worldwide Developers Conference.
- Created his first app, "Kid Calculator”.
- Successfully developed 11 apps to date.
- Most recently, in 2023, won the Melbourne Regional RoboCup Competition.
These accomplishments reflect Yuma's determination and passion for programming. Yuma dreams of introducing computer programming languages to as many people as possible.

At what age did Yuma start learning programming?

data.question:
Situation:
Two people meet on the way from school. They are Budi and Desi. Budi introduces himself.

Budi : Good morning, I’m Budi. Haven’t we met before?
Desi : I don’t think so. Well, anyway, hello, my name is Desi.
Budi : Hi, Desi. How do you do?.
Desi : How do you do. Do you stay around here?
Budi : Yeah. I stay in the Uptown Apartment on the fifth Avenue.
Desi : That’s great. I also stay there on the eleventh floor.
Budi : Mine’s on the tenth floor. Sorry, I have to get going.
Desi : See you then, bye.
Budi : Good bye

Where does Desi live?
She lives on the .... floor in the Uptown Apartement.
Which question is in the simple present tense?

answers.jawaban: Was she at the party last night?
Does he go to the library every weekend?
